title: Jack Anders Sells 10,000 Shares of Revolution Medicines (NASDAQ:RVMD) Stock
text: Revolution Medicines, Inc. (NASDAQ: RVMD - Get Free Report) CFO Jack Anders sold 10,000 shares of Revolution Medicines stock in a transaction dated Wednesday, January 7th. The stock was sold at an average price of $98.00, for a total value of $980,000.00. Following the sale, the chief financial officer owned 108,065 shares in the company, valued
